p: The PCA score plot of the VOC profile data showed species-dependent differentiation resulting from the separation group of C. amada samples from a group of C. longa samples in the different quadrants of the generated plot ( Figure 1a). The group of C. amada samples—accessions ZO45, ZO89, and ZO114—was scattered between lower and upper negative/positive quadrants, while the group of C. longa samples—accession ZO138—was situated in a lower negative quadrant of the plot ( Figure 1a).
